name: Please don't hate Christmas!
description:
Yandere x Otome x Christmas x Urban Legend!!

You haven't celebrated Christmas for years. This year,  you decided to return to your hometown---Snowflake Island, with your childhood friend, Albert. Albert treats you so well that you choose to stay forever. However,  you forgot something in the past, and it's still not solved...

Please note that this game contains mild violence,  paranoid love, and mild horror

It is just a demo of the full version.

♥7.8k words♥

♥6 CGs♥

♥3 endings♥

♥custom name♥

Available Languages: English (US), 繁體中文

The whole game was done by myself!

For the music, sound, and some background assets I used in the game：

Music: DOVA-SYNDROME

SFX: soundeffect-lab

Background resources: Aipict

SMS system by Nighten  https://nighten.itch.io/yet-another-phone-renpy

♥If you like this game, please leave a comment or give me a 5-star rating♥

I will update the development of further chapters on my Twitter(https://twitter.com/RiceOtomecoffee)free feel to follow me if you are interested!
